name: Ritchie Tiongson
text: At that price range? Buy an iPad Air 2 and a good keyboard case. But I have no idea what apps you'd use for programming. If you want a Windows device, and all you want to do is programming with basic internet functions, then there are a bunch of ACER/ASUS laptops at the 25-30k range

If you want a Windows device, and all you want to do is programming with basic internet functions, then there are a bunch of ACER/ASUS laptops at the 25-30k range
